name: YourTrain
description:
This is a simulation game of driving a train to transport customers on a Japanese railroad line.

No railroad knowledge is required to play "Your Train".
This game is a brain game with simple rules but requires a lot of brain power.


Customers are waiting at the station for the trains to arrive to take them to their destinations.
Start the trains and transport your customers.

You will earn money for every passenger who boards a train.
Adjust the interval between runs and the number of cars to achieve the highest revenue.
Departing trains costs money. If you send out too many trains and the boarding rate drops, you will lose your revenue.

The operation method is very easy and the rules are simple.
All you have to do is adjust the number of train cars and make the trains depart at the best time.
As the game progresses, express fares will also appear.

No technical knowledge is required at all.
Both people who like trains and people who like games can quickly understand and enjoy the game.

There are no in-app purchases. There are no ads.
Please concentrate on the game.
Share your operating results on social media.

Railroad tracks you can play with
JR East, JR Tokai, JR West, JR Kyushu, Tobu, Tokyu, Seibu, Keio, Keikyu, Keihan, Hankyu, Hanshin, Kintetsu, Meitetsu, Odakyu, Nankai, Nishitetsu, Sotetsu, Keisei, Tokyo Metro, Osaka Metro, Toei Subway, Tsukuba Express
